SELECT COUNT(ROWNUM) FROM TB_SLE LEFT JOIN TB_REV ON TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE = TB_REV.SEQ_SLE WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND CD_CTG LIKE ('%' || #{cd_ctg} || '%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SLE INNER JOIN TB_CTG ON TB_SLE.CD_CTG = TB_CTG.CD_CTG, TB_CTG TB_CTG2 WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND TB_CTG.CD_CTG_PARENT = TB_CTG2.CD_CTG AND (SLE_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%') OR TB_CTG.CTG_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%') OR TB_CTG2.CTG_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%'))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () rnum , SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , TB_SLE.CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , TB_CTG.CTG_NM FROM TB_SLE INNER JOIN TB_CTG ON TB_SLE.CD_CTG = TB_CTG.CD_CTG, TB_CTG TB_CTG2 WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND TB_CTG.CD_CTG_PARENT = TB_CTG2.CD_CTG AND (SLE_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%') OR TB_CTG.CTG_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%') OR TB_CTG2.CTG_NM LIKE ('%' || #{searchWord} || '%')) )
WHERE rnum >= (${currentPage} - 1) * ${linePerPage} + 1 AND rnum <= ${currentPage} * ${linePerPage}

SELECT ROWNUM rnum , TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , NVL(AVG(RATING), 0) AS rating FROM TB_SLE LEFT JOIN TB_REV ON TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE = TB_REV.SEQ_SLE WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND CD_CTG LIKE '0103%'
AND ROWNUM <= 10
GROUP BY TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , TB_SLE.DT_REG , rownum ORDER BY rating DESC

SELECT ROWNUM rnum , TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , NVL(AVG(RATING), 0) AS rating FROM TB_SLE LEFT JOIN TB_REV ON TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE = TB_REV.SEQ_SLE WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND CD_CTG LIKE '0102%'
AND ROWNUM <= 10
GROUP BY TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , TB_SLE.DT_REG , rownum ORDER BY rating DESC

SELECT ROWNUM rnum , TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , NVL(AVG(RATING), 0) AS rating FROM TB_SLE LEFT JOIN TB_REV ON TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE = TB_REV.SEQ_SLE WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND CD_CTG LIKE '0101%'
AND ROWNUM <= 10
GROUP BY TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , CD_CTG , IMG , DESCES , PRICE_SALE , TB_SLE.DT_REG , rownum ORDER BY rating DESC

SELECT tb_rev.SEQ_SLE , tb_rev.SEQ_CST , tb_rev.SEQ_REV , tb_rev.CONTENTS , tb_rev.RATING , (SELECT ID FROM TB_CST tb_cst WHERE tb_cst.SEQ_CST = tb_rev.SEQ_CST) ID , TO_CHAR(tb_rev.DT_REG, 'YYYY/MM/DD') dt_reg FROM TB_REV tb_rev WHERE tb_rev.SEQ_SLE = #{seq_sle}

SELECT SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , PRICE_SALE , (SELECT AVG(RATING) FROM TB_REV INNER JOIN TB_SLE ON TB_REV.SEQ_SLE = TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE AND TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE= #{seq_sle} GROUP BY TB_REV.SEQ_SLE) AS RATING , IMG , COM_NM , DESCES , REGISTER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REV INNER JOIN TB_SLE ON TB_REV.SEQ_SLE = TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE AND TB_SLE.SEQ_SLE= #{seq_sle} GROUP BY TB_REV.SEQ_SLE) AS COUNT FROM TB_SLE WHERE SEQ_SLE = #{seq_sle} AND CD_STATE_SALE = 1
SELECT ROWNUM rnum , SEQ_SLE , SLE_NM , PRICE_SALE , IMG , DESCES , REGISTER FROM TB_SLE tb_sle WHERE CD_STATE_SALE = 1 AND CD_CTG LIKE (#{cd_ctg} || '%') ORDER BY SEQ_SLE DESC
